column1: Smoque BBQ////I like this place. The BBQ is pretty darn good. Sauce is not overly sweet
column2: which i like. Baked Beans are good
column3: but too sweet. Fries are very good
column4: especially dunked in the BBQ sauce! I just wish the seating area was larger. Sometimes it's not fun eating BBQ when someone's bum is in your face...ack!
